availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, resident. Virginia native. Mother of Jane Collins, Peter Collins, and Melissa Collins. Married to James Hager in Johnson County on June 24, 1865. Mother of Lucinda Hager. Resident of Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, unknown district, p. 199.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Johnson Kentucky, County, Toms Creek District, p. 207B-208A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Johnson County Marriages, Film #001912950, p. 17 of 239 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
